code_value: Questions 1~2  Your friend Lily has just taken part in an English speech competition. Ask her two questions about the competition.</br>Questions 3~4  You are going to Bali for a trip. Ask your friend who has been there for some information about Bali.
Questions 1~2  Your friend Lily has just taken part in an English speech competition. Ask her two questions about the competition.
Questions 3~4  You are going to Bali for a trip. Ask your friend who has been there for some information about Bali.
